mapper.select: SELECT sa.AUTHOR_REC , sa.VIEW_NUM , sa.COMMENTS_NUM , sa.UPDATE_TIME , sa.CREATE_TIME , sa.ARTICLE_IMG , sa.ARTICLE_TYPE , sa.ARTICLE_DESC , sa.ARTICLE_TITLE , sa.FAVORITE_NUM ,CAST(sa.ARTICLE_ID as char) 'ARTICLE_ID' FROM ss_article sa
SELECT FLAG_ID, FLAG_DIST , FLAG_TYPE, FLAG_TYPE_DESC, FLAG_INFO FROM ss_flag WHERE STATE = '1'

SELECT sa.AUTHOR_REC , sa.VIEW_NUM , sa.COMMENTS_NUM , sa.UPDATE_TIME , sa.CREATE_TIME , sa.ARTICLE_IMG , sa.ARTICLE_TYPE , sa.ARTICLE_DESC , sa.ARTICLE_TITLE , CAST(sa.ARTICLE_ID as char) 'ARTICLE_ID' FROM ss_article sa, ss_article_flag saf, ss_flag sf WHERE sa.ARTICLE_ID = saf.ARTICLE_ID and saf.FLAG_ID = sf.FLAG_ID and saf.FLAG_ID = #{id} and sf.STATE = '1' limit #{start}, #{end}

SELECT sa.AUTHOR_REC 'authorRec', sa.VIEW_NUM 'viewNum', sa.COMMENTS_NUM 'commentsNum', sa.UPDATE_TIME 'updateTime', sa.CREATE_TIME 'createTime', sa.ARTICLE_IMG 'articleImg', sa.ARTICLE_TYPE 'articleType', sa.ARTICLE_DESC 'articleDesc', sa.ARTICLE_TITLE 'articleTitle', CAST(sa.ARTICLE_ID as char) 'articleId' FROM ss_article sa, ss_article_flag saf, ss_flag sf WHERE sa.ARTICLE_ID = saf.ARTICLE_ID and saf.FLAG_ID = sf.FLAG_ID and sf.FLAG_DIST = #{dist} ORDER BY sa.UPDATE_TIME DESC limit #{start}, #{end}
SELECT sf.FLAG_ID, sf.FLAG_DIST , sf.FLAG_TYPE, sf.FLAG_TYPE_DESC, sf.FLAG_INFO from ss_flag sf, ss_article_flag saf WHERE saf.ARTICLE_ID = #{ARTICLE_ID} and saf.FLAG_ID = sf.FLAG_ID and STATE = '1'

SELECT DISTINCT sa.AUTHOR_REC, sa.VIEW_NUM , sa.COMMENTS_NUM , sa.UPDATE_TIME , sa.CREATE_TIME , sa.ARTICLE_IMG , sa.ARTICLE_TYPE , sa.ARTICLE_DESC , sa.ARTICLE_TITLE , sa.FAVORITE_NUM, CAST(sa.ARTICLE_ID as char) 'ARTICLE_ID' FROM ss_article sa, ss_article_flag saf, ss_flag sf WHERE sa.ARTICLE_ID = saf.ARTICLE_ID and saf.FLAG_ID = sf.FLAG_ID and sf.FLAG_DIST = #{dist} and sf.STATE = '1' ORDER BY sa.UPDATE_TIME DESC

SELECT sa.AUTHOR_REC , sa.VIEW_NUM , sa.COMMENTS_NUM , sa.UPDATE_TIME , sa.ARTICLE_SIGN, sa.CREATE_TIME , sa.ARTICLE_IMG , sa.ARTICLE_TYPE , sa.ARTICLE_DESC , sa.FAVORITE_NUM, sa.ARTICLE_TITLE , CAST(sa.ARTICLE_ID as char) 'ARTICLE_ID', CAST(su.USER_ID as char) 'USER_ID', su.USER_NAME FROM ss_article sa LEFT JOIN ss_user su ON sa.USER_ID = su.USER_ID WHERE sa.ARTICLE_ID = #{id} and su.STATE = '1'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ss_article WHERE USER_ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE ss_article SET VIEW_NUM = #{viewNum} WHERE ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId}
